programs.title: Our Programs

frittSinn.title: FRITT SINN Program
frittSinn.description: The FRITT SINN program is the foundation of our work, designed to prevent psychiatric diagnoses by fostering self-awareness, emotional resilience, and social intelligence. It is a structured yet adaptable system that helps individuals gain control over their thoughts, emotions, and interpersonal relationships.

objectives.title: Core Objectives
objectives.selfReeducation: Self-Reeducation – Individuals learn to become the authors of their own personal and psychological narratives.
objectives.socialDevelopment: Social Development – Strengthening interpersonal relationships and fostering teamwork, collaboration, and tolerance.
objectives.emotionalMastery: Emotional Mastery – Developing coping mechanisms to handle stress, frustration, and emotional setbacks.
objectives.professionalGrowth: Professional & Personal Growth – Encouraging critical thinking, problem-solving, and entrepreneurial mindsets.

tools.title: The 12 Multifocal Tools
tools.description: Our program is structured around 12 core tools for personal transformation:
list: Becoming the Author of Your Own Story
Recognizing and Creating Beauty in Life
tools.note: These tools have been rigorously analyzed using the Theory of Multifocal Intelligence (TMI) to ensure their effectiveness in promoting long-term mental well-being.

supportGroups.description: We provide safe spaces where children, parents, and caregivers can share their experiences, receive guidance, and support one another.
benefits: Build a sense of community and belonging

about.title: About From Above

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: From Above is a dedicated initiative aimed at fostering mental well-being and self-development through the FRITT SINN program, a global tool for preventing psychiatric diagnoses. We believe that every individual has the power to shape their own life story and develop the skills needed to navigate emotional, social, and professional challenges. Our goal is to empower children, youth, parents, and professionals with the knowledge and tools for psychological self-care and personal growth.

psychological.title: Personalized Psychological Support
psychological.description: We understand that every individual's journey is unique. Our team of professionals offers personalized assessments and tailored psychological support, including:

family.description: Families play a critical role in the well-being of a child. Our family-focused therapy sessions provide:

family.sibling: Sibling and extended family support to strengthen relationships
family.group: Group therapy options to foster healthy family communication
